title: Bug 37021: Source path incorrect in declare warning on binary files
description: Bug 37021: Source path incorrect in declare warning on binary files [java|aj]. The tests in tests/new/binaryWarnings/ directory can be executed to reproduce the issue. It should be noted that these tests may result in false positives due to the absence of filename checking in harness verification of messages. In AJDT, when the filename is meaningless, it is omitted.
OB: The source path in declare warning messages for targeting .class files from injars is displayed as 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main.class'.
EB: The source path in declare warning messages for targeting .class files from injars should be displayed as 'app/Main.class' instead of 'app.Main.class'.
